entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
